summary: The rise of Colombian soccer is attributed to the influx of drug money into the sport by Pablo Escobar and the other drug cartels. However, the team's swift decline after Escobar's death results in the murder of star player Andres Escobar.
cast: María Ester Escobar|Francisco Maturana|Alexis García V.|Jaime Gaviria Gómez|Jhon Jairo Velásquez|Rubén Darío Pinilla C.|Juan José Bellini|Fernando Rodríguez Mondragón|Eduardo Rojo|Leonel Alvarez|Luz María Escobar|Luis Fernando Herrera|Fernando Brito|Tom Cash|Alirio López|César Gaviria Trujillo|Pamela Cascardo|Gabriel Jaime Gómez|Carlos Valderrama|Adolfo Valencia|Faustino Asprilla|César Mauricio Velásquez|Oscar Córdoba|Mauricio Serna|Gentil Vidal|Aria McKenna
title: The Two Escobars
